# Spatial 

## Raster

```{r setup}
#| include: false


library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(glue)
library(sf)
library(stars)
library(terra)

# path to raster
raster_file_path = here::here("wiki", "data_raw", "SPARTACUS", "SPARTACUS2-DAILY_TX_2024.nc")

austria_4326_path = here::here("wiki", "data_raw", "austria_4326.fgb")
```

### Reprojecting


## Load data

:::{.callout-note collapse="true"}

## `ncdump -h` on the large file

```{r}
# Use intern = TRUE to capture the output
ncdump = system(glue("ncdump -h {raster_file_path}"), intern = TRUE)
cat(ncdump, sep="\n")
```

:::


:::{.callout-note collapse="true"}

## Read in the data

```{r}

# the  austrian shape
austria = read_sf(austria_4326_path)
prin(austria)

# load it using stars
data_raw_stars = read_ncdf(raster_file_path)
print(data_raw_stars)


# load it using terra
data_raw_terra = terra::rast(raster_file_path)
print(data_raw_terra)

```
:::
